eric7.QScintilla.DocstringGenerator.EricdocGenerator

Module implementing the docstring generator for the 'ericdoc' style.

Global Attributes

None

Classes

None

Functions

generateEricDoc Function to generate the docstring line list iaw.

generateEricDoc

generateEricDoc(functionInfo)

Function to generate the docstring line list iaw. eric documentation style.

Note: Partial English text is created with DESCRIPTION placeholders for descriptions and TYPE placeholders for type information

functionInfo (FunctionInfo)
object containing the function information to base the docstring on
Return:
list of docstring lines
Return Type:
str
